extendedInfo.description: Angry zombie ducks are trying to escape from dark forest. Shoot flying birds by tapping on them. One escaped duck will cost you one life. Excellent shoot in a row will gain you high score, while hit rate > 98% will award you +1 life. Bullet can be manually reload or auto-reolad with 3 seconds delay.Tag: duck,hunter,bird

reviews.title: Galaxy S II (Sprint)
reviews.comment: This Game is Flawless on the Galaxy S II - No Skips, No Shutter, No Stutter - !! I Love It !! - Keep up the Good Work !! There is a Skill Level for Any Age Group or Ability - I Would recommend it to Anyone ...

reviews.title: Very Cool App
reviews.comment: I love this app the sound affect sounds like the real deal. For all you duck hunters out there or you non duck hunters this is a great app. I do recommend this app to any I have no problem at all with this app love it.
